eu_ai_act.systemic_risk_definition: Models trained with more than 10^25 FLOPs are deemed to pose systemic risks.
required_evaluations: Perform model evaluations to identify and mitigate systemic risks
Assess and mitigate possible systemic risks
Ensure the cyber and physical security of their models
documentation_requirements: Create and adopt a safety and security framework that explains risk management measures
Compile a safety and security model report for each model detailing compliance with the framework
transparency_obligations: Publish summaries of safety and security framework and model reports under limited conditions
